title: Looking to wrap up the Polar Bear subset
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: Looking to wrap up the Polar Bear subset
posts.post_content:
As I'm sure most of you have seen in my various posts over the last year or two, I've been plugging away at the Polar Bear back set.
I've gotten all the heavy lifting out of the way, so I'm now down to just commons.
These will go in my binder, so I'm fine with (and actually prefer) rougher condition. I only ask that the players face, name, and the back of the card be in tact.
Below is the list of players I have remaining.
I will update this as I progress.
I would prefer to buy, but I'd consider trades in the right scenario.
Thanks all for looking, and for your help in getting me this far!
